name: The Book of Evil | Escape the Room
name_original: The Book of Evil | Escape the Room
description:
The game is all about the book.Which is an evil book and has evil verses. A professor has stolen the book from monastery and you must find out the book and try to put it back on its real place if you can. Because, if some one recites these verses can acquire black powers.Play this detective game and make investigation through the mystery manor.

You will have to point and click on the objects and the hidden things to find out. Having, revealing all the clues and solving all the puzzles and riddles, you may reach to each and every room and open every door and floor of this house. Than, you would be able to examine all the things closely to find the missing speller and escape the mysterious mansion.
